refnamediv.refpurpose: a class that translates formulas in internal mCRL2 format to benchmarks in the SMT-LIB format

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The class &class_smt_lib_solver; is a base class for SMT solvers that read the SMT-LIB format [Silvio Ranise and Cesare Tinelli. The SMT-LIB Standard: Version 1.1. Technical Report, Department of Computer Science, The University of Iowa, 2005. (Available at goedel.cs.uiowa.edu/smtlib)]. It inherits from the class &class_smt_solver;.

The method &smt_lib_solver_translate; receives a propositional formula in conjunctive normal form as parameter &par_formula; and translates it to a benchmark in SMT-LIB format. The result is saved as field &type_string; &var_benchmark;.

refsect1.title: Preconditions
refsect1.para:
The following precondition has to be satisfied for &smt_lib_solver_translate;:
The argument passed as parameter &par_formula; is a list of propositional formulas in internal mCRL2 format. The argument represents a formula in conjunctive normal form, where the elements of the list represent the clauses
